mapper.update:
UPDATE so_delivery
user_id = #{userId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
type = #{type},
so_id = #{soId},
so_child_id = #{soChildId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
delivery_company_id = #{deliveryCompanyId},
delivery_express_nbr = #{deliveryExpressNbr},
actual_storage_time = #{actualStorageTime},
actual_receipt_time = #{actualReceiptTime},
stock_out_no = #{stockOutNo},
remark = #{remark},
delivery_type = #{deliveryType},
delivery_remark = #{deliveryRemark},
package_code = #{packageCode},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}
